title: november 18: happy birthday mr. mouse
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the birthday of a mouse that was also the birth of cartoon sound as we know it today. She also chats about a big music achievement from 2017. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
